CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 16, 1961, pg. A3 reads: " 'New Era' Dawns at Herron Hill Junior High -High Aims - Like others, Mrs. Thelma Lovette and daughter, Thelma, confer with counselors, like Mr. Haggerty, to learn better ways of learning more."
TitMainTitle: Francis L. Haggerty, seated across from Thelma Lovette and daughter Thelma, in office in Herron Hill Junior High School
